channel.title: google on Kelvas blog
channel.description: Recent content in google on Kelvas blog

item.title: Firebase : Functions
item.description: Firebase is a very complete service offered by Google that allows a large number of things: Authentication Database Storage Hosting Functions ML Kit Crashlytics Performance Test Lab … And many other things! The part we are interested in today is the cloud function. As you probably know, cloud functions are simple pieces of code executed on demand. They are generally serveless and can therefore be executed anywhere and at any time without being repeated in a specific context.

item.title: Upload flutter project on Google Play
item.description: Upload flutter projet on Google Play # Have you ever tried flutter? If not, I invite you to do it, it’s worth a visit! But did you go as far as publishing on stores and especially on Google Play? I personally tried to publish an application made with this technology on Google Play but I found myself faced with an unexpected error: That’s a problem! Fortunately Android Studio allows us to compile for several platforms in the same APK but also to compile several APK, each for a different platform!
